mapper.select: select id, bbs_id, owner_id, owner, comment, date_format(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createDate from bbs_comment where is_delete = 0 and bbs_id = #{bbsId}
mapper.insert: insert into bbs_comment (bbs_id, owner_id, owner, comment) values (#{bbsId}, #{ownerId}, #{owner}, #{comment});
mapper.update: update bbs_comment set comment = #{comment} where id = #{id} and owner_id = #{ownerId}
update bbs_comment set is_delete = 1 where id = #{id}
